question:
Pragati (Pro-Active Governance and Timely Implementation):
  1. is an initiative under the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
  2. aims to monitor and ensure the completion of on-going Central Sector Infrastructure Projects
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because Pragati (Pro-Active Governance and Timely Implementation) is an initiative under the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation. Second statement is correct.
